pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:0.5_0: Ime kho panāyyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako bhikkhunisaṅghassa udositaṁ datvā kālaṅkato hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.4_0: eko assaddho appasanno, eko saddho pasanno.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.6_0: Atha kho so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.8_1: so saddho pasanno taṁ assaddhaṁ appasannaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.11_0: Dutiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.13_0: Atha kho so saddho pasanno taṁ assaddhaṁ appasannaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.16_0: Tatiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.22_0: Atha kho so udosito tehi bhājīyamāno tassa assaddhassa appasannassa pāpuṇāti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.23_0: Atha kho so assaddho appasanno bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.25_0: Evaṁ vutte thullanandā bhikkhunī taṁ purisaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.31_0: “api nāyyā tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā sakkhiṁ ṭhapayitvā dānaṁ diyyamānan”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.33_0: “saccaṁ kho ayyā āhā”ti taṁ udositaṁ bhikkhunisaṅghassa akaṁsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.34_0: Atha kho so puriso parājito ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.39_0: Atha kho so puriso daṇḍito bhikkhunupassayassa avidūre ājīvakaseyyaṁ kārāpetvā ājīvake uyyojesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.44_0: “paṭhamaṁ bhikkhuniyo udositaṁ acchindāpesuṁ, dutiyaṁ daṇḍāpesuṁ, tatiyaṁ bandhāpesuṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.46_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.47_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.49_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.56.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā dāsena vā kammakārena vā antamaso samaṇaparibbājakenāpi,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.56.1_1: ayaṁ bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṁ dhammaṁ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṁ saṅghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.16_0: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca sikkhamānañca sāmaṇerañca sāmaṇeriñca ṭhapetvā yo koci paribbājakasamāpanno.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.17_0: Aḍḍaṁ karissāmīti dutiyaṁ vā pariyesati gacchati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.26_0: saṅghova tassā āpattiyā mānattaṁ deti mūlāya paṭikassati abbheti,
